part_description: Two blue rectangular lenses, two white arms attached at sides.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are connected to the arms at the hinges, allowing the arms to fold inward for storage. The lenses are positioned parallel to each other, creating a frame for viewing. The arms provide support and stability when worn.
external_interaction_description: The glasses are worn on the face, with the arms resting on the ears and the lenses positioned in front of the eyes. They enhance 3D viewing experiences by filtering images, interacting with 3D displays in cinemas or home setups.
